data.eml:eml: New host associations and a novel species for the gall-inducing acacia rust genus Ravenelia in South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ebinghaus, Malte, Maier, Wolfgang, Wingfield, Michael J., Begerow, Dominik (2018): New host associations and a novel species for the gall-inducing acacia rust genus Ravenelia in South Africa. MycoKeys 43: 1-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.43.25090, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.43.25090
